title: Ikumonogakari The Animation

alternative_titles.ja: いくものがかり The Animation

synopsis: Japan was engulfed in a demographic crisis, forcing the government to implement the "Ikumonogakari" law, which permitted promiscuous sexual interactions among the people. They started doing practical and pedagogical activities on the lessons of sexual life and a partner's sexual fulfillment. The protagonists are young and inexperienced, so practical exercises will help them to improve their skills.
